plot: It's love at first sight when a rebellious playboy falls in love with a girl. He now has to go to great lengths to win her heart.
title: Rak Sud Teen
plot_es: It's love at first sight when a rebellious playboy falls in love with a girl. He now has to go to great lengths to win her heart.
plot_en: It's love at first sight when a rebellious playboy falls in love with a girl. He now has to go to great lengths to win her heart.
